## ApplicationSetup.registerApp() method

Register an mountable application to the system. Apps will be mounted based on their `rootRoute`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
registerApp(app: App): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  app | <code>App</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
